title: Support custom shaders (HLSL)
body: Allow applications to define custom shaders in HLSL. This will allow sophisticated game graphics and real-time image processing. Also allow access to MP4 encoder library (hardware accelerated) so apps can generate their own videos. This should also allow apps to read existing videos, modify frames and write them back.

comments.body:
HLSL is the only reason i'm not making something for the WP7 right now...
As a game dev, this is a must have.
